nodes.text: Kharrus' staff was a staff which Senator Kharrus used habitually during the Clone Wars. It was about one meter tall and its end had a large gold medallion. After Kharrus was killed on Florrum, Representative Jar Jar Binks placed this staff on the Senator's grave.

The top of Kharrus' staff resembles the headpiece of the Staff of Ra from the first Indiana Jones movie, Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981), which was also produced by George Lucas. The Ark of the Covenant made an appearance as well, in the episode "Liberty on Ryloth".
